query_1.text: How did Taylor Swift's transition from country to pop music influence her commercial success and critical acclaim in the music industry?

query_2.text: In what ways has Ed Sheeran's songwriting and collaboration with other artists contributed to his status as one of the best-selling music artists of all time?

query_3.text: How has Adele Laurie Blue Adkins's vocal style and emotional depth in her music impacted her ability to connect with audiences and achieve record-breaking sales?

query_4.text: In what ways has Beyoncé Knowles Carter's role as a cultural icon and advocate for social justice influenced her music and public persona throughout her career?

query_5.text: How did Bruno Mars's unique blend of musical genres and his contributions to the live performance landscape shape his identity as a leading figure in contemporary pop music?

query_6.text: In what ways has Lady Gaga's advocacy for mental health and LGBTQ+ rights intersected with her artistic expression and public image in the entertainment industry?
